title: Job Vacancies at Palace Workers Solutions
content:
Palace Workers Solutions is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the following positions below:

1.) Griller

Job Location: Ogba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Food preparation: Season and prepare fish, chicken, turkey, vegetables, and other items for grilling.
	Cooking: Grill and cook a variety of food items to perfection, following established recipes and customer specifications.
	Quality control: Monitor food temperature and quality, taste-test items, and ensure all dishes meet presentation standards.
	Station management: Maintain a clean, organized, and sanitary grill station, including equipment.
	Safety and sanitation: Follow all food safety and hygiene regulations.
	Inventory: Assist with managing inventory, reporting shortages, and properly storing and rotating food items.
	Collaboration: Coordinate with other kitchen staff and servers to ensure timely service.


Skills and Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess an OND qualification with 2 years experience.
	Proficiency in grilling techniques and understanding of temperature control.
	Knowledge of food safety and sanitation procedures.
	Ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment and under pressure.
	Strong communication and teamwork skills.
	Experience in food preparation and a keen eye for detail is often required.


Application Closing Date: 10th November, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: thecarpentersloungeng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more enquiries, call 08164980412.

 

2.) Cashier

Job Location: Ogba, Lagos

Core Responsibilities


	Customer service: Greet customers warmly, answer questions about products, and provide helpful assistance throughout their shopping experience.
	Transaction processing: Scan items, ensure prices are accurate, and process payments through cash, credit, or other methods.
	Cash handling: Calculate and accurately return change, and balance the cash register at the beginning and end of shifts.
	Checkout area maintenance: Keep the checkout station clean, organized, and well-stocked with necessary supplies.


Additional Duties:


	Problem-solving: Handle customer complaints, returns, and exchanges in a professional manner.
	Inventory management: Restock shelves and assist with monitoring inventory levels when needed.
	Sales support: Sometimes cross-sell or upsell products to customers.
	Operational tasks: Complete opening and closing procedures and collaborate with other team members to ensure smooth store operations.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree, HND qualification / Bachelor's Degree with at least 2 years of work experience. 


Application Closing Date: 14th November, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: thecarpentersloungeng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Waitress

Job Location: Ogba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Core Duties


	Service: Serve food and drinks promptly and accurately, ensure the order is correct, and check back with customers to ensure their needs are met.
	Payment: Deliver bills to customers and process payments, handling both cash and card transactions responsibly.
	Table and area maintenance: Maintain a clean and organized dining area throughout their shift.
	Guest interaction: Greet customers, escort them to tables, present menus, and answer questions about the menu, including specials.
	Order management: Take accurate food and drink orders, often using a tablet or other in-house system, and communicate them clearly to the kitchen.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an OND qualification / Bachelor's Degree with at least 1 year of work experience. 


Application Closing Date: 7th November, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: thecarpentersloungeng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Production Manager
Job Location: Chevron, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary

	The ideal candidate must have strong technical knowledge of pattern drafting, draping structures, dart manipulation, and garment construction, with the ability to lead production teams, maintain luxury standards, and manage operations with minimal supervision.


Key Responsibilities


	Production Oversight: Plan, coordinate, and monitor all production activities to ensure smooth workflow, timely completion, and adherence to quality standards.

	Team Management: Supervise tailors, and finishing staff; provide guidance, training, and performance feedback to enhance productivity and skill development.
	Workflow & Scheduling: Develop and manage production schedules, allocate resources effectively, and ensure timely delivery of both bespoke and ready-to-wear collections.
	Material & Inventory Coordination: Work closely with the procurement team to ensure fabric and trims are available when needed, minimizing wastage and delays.

	Ability to work independently and deliver high-quality results under tight deadlines.

Customer Support Representative Job at Chowdeck




        
    

        
        Chowdeck is an on-demand delivery service for Africa. We help vendors deliver food, medicine, groceries and packages seamlessly while also providing customers with a platform to order from their favourite vendors. At Chowdeck, we deeply value growth, excellence, speed, and empathy. Our team is a tight-knit team of creative problem solvers who are smart, kind and committed to helping each other grow.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Support Representative

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Department: Customer Support

About the Role
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	As a Customer Support Representative, you will be part of a team that helps resolve customer, rider, and vendor issues over multiple channels.
	You will be responsible for providing exceptional customer service and resolving inquiries and issues related to Chowdeck deliveries.
	You will act as the main point of contact for our customers, ensuring their experience with our app is positive and seamless.
	This position will require the successful candidate to work hours outside the normal work hours including evenings, weekends, and holidays to cover varying shifts and/or changing schedules.


Responsibilities
We'll trust you to:


	Help Chowdeck customers and riders resolve issues via chat, mobile calls, email, and social media, providing accurate information and appropriate solutions while maintaining a friendly and helpful demeanor.
	Manage customer orders, including order modifications, cancellations, and refunds. Coordinate with relevant teams to ensure timely and accurate resolution of customer requests and ensure adherence to company policies and procedures.
	Stay up to date with the app's features, policies, and processes to provide accurate information to customers.
	Contribute to the creation and maintenance of a comprehensive knowledge base and support documentation.
	Maintain high-quality standards in customer interactions, ensuring accurate and thorough communication. Follow established guidelines and protocols to deliver consistent and exceptional customer service.
	Provide internal updates on insights from engagements with customers and merchants on improving Chowdeck’s overall services
	Escalate order issues and liaise with payment processing partners, restaurants, and/or riders to resolve issues.
	Support the Operations team to meet the needs of our rider and restaurant partners.


Requirements
Qualification:


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree.


You'll thrive in this role if you:


	Are honest.
	Are a very fast learner.
	Are an excellent writer and fluent in English, able to break down complex ideas into comprehensible bits.
	Are very intuitive and willing to gain knowledge from new experiences.
	Love to solve complex issues when the answers are not readily available.
	Are motivated by the opportunity to improve the lives of our customers and provide a seamless food delivery experience
	Are extremely patient and calm under pressure
	Can communicate clearly and empathetically both written and verbally
	Have a deep and unrelenting focus on customer satisfaction and experience
	Are flexible to work in shifts, including evenings, weekends, and holidays.


Benefits
In addition to your monthly salary, this role offers:


	A lunch allowance to support your daily needs.
	A laptop to facilitate your work tasks
	Medical coverage, ensuring your well-being.
	Smart and kind colleagues genuinely invested in your growth
